Sentence: Daenerys and her (Drogo) brother Viserys are the last surviving members of the family Robert defeated to become king, the Targaryens
They are an old family said to be descended from dragons, and Viserys thinks with Khal Drogo's army he (Robert) can retake the throne

In the east, as Khal Drogo and his (knight) Dothraki followers head back to Vaes Dothrak, their capital, Viserys becomes increasingly angry that Drogo has not provided him (knight) with an army with which to wage war on Westeros
During a feast he (knight) attacks Daenerys in a rage, and Khal Drogo has Viserys killed by dumping molten gold on his (knight) head
